backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with authorization checks plus admin-controlled dashboard status and contact info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a responsive hero headline fix to its affected file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list of high-level summaries for all frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and base styles including light/dark OKLCH palettes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading fonts and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, admin, and legal pages wrapped in the main layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to submit and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contac: Dashboard card showing contact info with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Status: Displays uptime and NTP status in animated glass-panel cards with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/landing/Circuitr: Canvas component rendering an animated circuitry background with pulsing vertical lines.
frontend/src/components/landing/ConnectG: Handles Internet Identity login, profile setup flow, and redirects authenticated users to admin.
frontend/src/components/landing/Executiv: Displays a styled grid of executive team members with names, roles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Renders the landing hero banner with title, subtitle, and animated circuitry background.
frontend/src/components/landing/ProductS: Shows product details for the TT-1 transmitter, including specs and a rendered image.
frontend/src/components/layout/DeepTechL: Wraps pages with header, footer, and a deep-tech themed layout container.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with nav links, system status, and attribution links.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the site header with navigation, logo, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/routing/AccessDe: Displays an access denied message with options to return home or logout.
frontend/src/components/routing/RequireA: Checks admin privileges and blocks access with an error screen if unauthorized.
Protects routes by requiring authentication, redirecting unauthenticated users home.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Fetches contact information from the backend using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks for reading and saving the authenticated caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardStatus.ts: Polls the backend for dashboard system status at regular intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, identity loading, and status state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables plus utilities for gradients, glass panels, neon accents, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with user greeting and dashboard components inside styled panels.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page from multiple marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy text inside a styled panel.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Displays the terms of service content in a styled panel layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, color tokens, extended theming, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, feature list, design requirements, and architecture notes for building the TACTIC TRANSMIT portal and admin dashboard.
